GapFillInput.Title: Ambitions and dreams
GapFillInput.Instruction: Choose a word from the word pool and type it in each gap.

Content.Question:
Ken: Steve, you became famous when you were only twelve and you started your own business buying and selling trading cards on the Internet. Now you're eighteen.
Steve: That's right.
Ken: And you earn $1 million a month!
Steve: That's right.
Ken: What are you doing at the moment?
Steve: Well, I've just bought an apartment in St Petersburg.
Ken: That's because your girlfriend's Russian?
Steve: Yes. We're going to get married next year.
Ken: Congratulations! Do you want to have children?
Steve: Well, Lena wants five! I'm not so sure.
Ken: Right! What ambitions have you got for the future?
Steve: I'd like to write a novel.
Ken: Really?
Steve: Yes, or appear in a film.
Ken: Right.
Steve: And also I'm learning how to fly a plane. I'd like to fly round the world single-handed.
Ken: Well, the best of luck for the future and thank you for being with us today!
